title: v2.1.1 crashes on startup
body:
## Description

I've upgrade every version with no problem, but this one will not run with error "Task panic. This is a bug! ". LOG entry below.

## Version

lighthouse-v2.1.1-aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu

## Expected Behaviour

Start up normal without a bug error.

## Steps to resolve

Rolled back and works fine.

Jan 31 19:50:31.241 CRIT Task panic. This is a bug!              advice: Please check above for a backtrace and notify the developers, message: <none>, task_name: validator_client

Thanks for getting in touch. This is a known issue when running a v2.1.1 validator client against a v2.0.1 beacon node, please see https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/2958 and https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/2957#issuecomment-1021150217.

The fix is to upgrade all the beacon nodes to v2.1.1 before upgrading the validator client to v2.1.1.

This bug has been fixed in `unstable` and the bugfix will be available in the forthcoming v2.1.2 release in the next few days.
Ok thank you. I found which node was the issue and removed it. It's running now.
